name: Simple Roguelike (Faherya)
description:
Roguelike is a game developed over three days during an event at the Centro RPG Maker. While a typical hero ventured into a typical world, his princess was again raptured. Invade the cave of a powerful Ogre to save it.

  1. The game has four explorable maps. The first three have three versions each.
  2. Chests have random weapons and potions.

The project is exactly as it was sent to the event. In the future, there may or may not be updates with added content and final polishing.

Created with RPG Maker MV

Graphics & Sound: Ocean's Dream

Special thanks to Centro RPG Maker, ct_bolt, rainyday and TheoAllen
